Activation(uint16,address,bool).details: triggered when the converter is activated

params._activated: true if the converter was activated, false if it was deactivated

Conversion(address,address,address,uint2.details: triggered when a conversion between two tokens occurs

params._amount: input amount in units of the source token
params._conversionFee: conversion fee in units of the target token
params._return: output amount minus conversion fee in units of the target token

ConversionFeeUpdate(uint32,uint32).details: triggered when the conversion fee is updated

params._newFee: new fee percentage, represented in ppm
params._prevFee: previous fee percentage, represented in ppm

TokenRateUpdate(address,address,uint256,.details: triggered when the rate between two tokens in the converter changes note that the event might be dispatched for rate updates between any two tokens in the converter
